spell.name: Protection from Evil and Good (İyi ve Kötüden Korunma)

m.text: kutsal su ya da toz gümüş ve demir, büyü bunu tüketir

entries: Büyü bitene kadar, dokunduğun istekli bir varlık belirli varlık tiplerine karşı korunur: aberasyonlar, kutsallar, elementaller, fey, zebaniler, ve yaşayan ölüler.

Bu koruma bir kaç fayda sağlar. O tip varlıklar hedefe karşı saldırılarında dezavantajlı olurlar. Hedef onlar tarafından cezbedilemez, korkutulamaz ya da hükmedilemez. Eğer hedef bu tip bir varlık tarafından zaten cezbedilmiş, korkmuş ya da hükmedilmiş bir durumdaysa, bu etkiye karşı atacağı yeni kurtulma zarında avantajı olur.

spell.name: Protection from Poison (Zehirden Koruma)
entries: Bir varlığa dokunursun. Eğer {@condition zehirlenme} etkisi altısındaysa zehri ortadan kaldırırsın. Eğer hedefi birden çok zehir etkiliyorsa, var olduğunu bildiğin bir zehri ya da rastgele bir zehri ortadan kaldırırsın.
Süre boyunca, hedefin {@condition zehirlenme}'ye karşı atacağı kurtulma zarlarında avantajı olur, ve zehir hasarına direnci olur.

spell.name: Purify Food and Drink (Yiyecek ve İçeceği Arıt)
entries: Merkezi menzilin içerisinde olan 5 fitlik bir çaptaki tüm büyüsüz yiyecek ve içecekler, zehir ve hastalıktan arınır.

spell.name: Raise Dead

m.text: a diamond worth at least 500 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided that it has been dead no longer than 10 gün. If the creature's soul is both willing and at liberty to rejoin the body, the creature returns to life with 1 hit point.

This spell also neutralizes any zehir and cures nonmagical diseases that affected the creature at the time it died. This spell doesn't, however, remove magical diseases, curses, or similar effects, if these aren't first removed prior to casting the spell, they take effect when the creature returns to life. The spell can't return an undead creature to life.

This spell closes all mortal wounds, but it doesn't restore missing body parts. If the creature is lacking body parts or organs integral for its survival—its head, for instance—the spell automatically fails.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a -4 penalty to all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. Every time the target finishes a long rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it disappears.

spell.name: Rary's Telepathic Bond

components.m: pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures

entries: You forge a telepathic link among up to eight willing creatures of your choice within range, psychically linking each creature to all the others for the duration. Creatures with Intelligence scores of 2 or less aren't affected by this spell.

Until the spell ends, the targets can communicate telepathically through the bond whether or not they have a common language. The communication is possible over any distance, though it can't extend to other planes of existence.

spell.name: Ray of Enfeeblement (Zayıflatma Işını)
entries: Menzilindeki bir varlığa doğru parmağından zayıflatıcı bir siyah ışın çıkar. Hedefe karşı menzilli büyü saldırısı yap. Vurursa, büyü bitene kadar hedef Kuvvet kullanan tüm silahlı saldırılarla yarı hasar verir.
Hedef her sırasının sonunda büyüye karşı bir Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarı atar. Başarılı olursa büyü sonlanır.

spell.name: Ray of Frost (Buz Işını)
entries: Menzilindeki bir varlığa, çok soğuk mavi-beyaz bir ışın gönderirsin. Hedefe karşı menzilli büyü saldırısı yap. Vurursa, {@dice 1d8} soğuk hasarı alır, ve bir sonraki sıranın başına kadar hızı 10 fit azalır.
Bu büyünün hasarı belirli seviyelerde {@dice 1d8} artarak 5. seviyede ({@dice 2d8}), 11. seviyede ({@dice 3d8}) ve 17. seviyede ({@dice 4d8}) olur.

spell.name: Ray of Sickness (Hastalık Işını)
entries: Menzilindeki bir varlığa hastalıklı yeşilimsi bir enerji ışını gider. Hedefe karşı bir menzilli büyü saldırısı yap. Vurursa, hedef {@dice 2d8} zehir hasarı alır ve Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olursa, bir sonraki sıranın sonuna kadar zehirlenme durumu etkisi altında kalır.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 2. seviye ya da üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 1. sonrasında her seviye için hasar {@dice 1d8} artar.

spell.name: Regenerate

components.m: a prayer wheel and holy water

entries: You touch a creature and stimulate its natural healing ability. The target regains {@dice 4d8+15} hit points. For the duration of the spell, the target regains 1 hit point at the start of each of its turns (10 hit points each dakika).

The target's severed body members (fingers, legs, tails, and so on), if any, are restored after 2 dakika. If you have the severed part and hold it to the stump, the spell instantaneously causes the limb to knit to the stump.

spell.name: Reincarnate

m.text: rare oils and unguents worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You touch a dead humanoid or a piece of a dead humanoid. Provided that the creature has been dead no longer than 10 gün, the spell forms a new adult body for it and then calls the soul to enter that body. If the target's soul isn't free or willing to do so, the spell fails.

The magic fashions a new body for the creature to inhabit, which likely causes the creature's race to change. The DM rolls a {@dice d100} and consults the following table to determine what form the creature takes when restored to life, or the DM chooses a form.

The reincarnated creature recalls its former life and experiences. It retains the capabilities it had in its original form, except it exchanges its original race for the new one and changes its racial traits accordingly.

spell.name: Remove Curse (Lanet Kaldır)
entries: Dokunuşunla bir varlığı ya da nesneyi etkileyen tüm lanetler kalkar. Eğer nesne lanetli bir büyülü eşya ise, laneti kalır ama sahibinin ona olan bağını koparır ki bu nesne çıkarılabilsin ya da atılabilsin.

spell.name: Resistance (Direnç)

components.m: minyatür bir pelerin

entries: İstekli bir varlığa dokunursun. Büyü bitmeden önce bir kereliğine, hedef {@dice d4} atıp sonucunu seçtiği bir kurtulma zarına ekleyebilir. Bu d4'lük zarı kurtulma zarından önce ya da sonra atabilir. Sonrasında büyü sona erer.

spell.name: Resurrection

m.text: a diamond worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You touch a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a century, that didn't die of old age, and that isn't undead. If its soul is free and willing, the target returns to life with all its hit points.

This spell neutralizes any poisons and cures normal diseases afflicting the creature when it died. It doesn't, however, remove magical diseases, curses, and the like, if such affects aren't removed prior to casting the spell, they afflict the target on its return to life.
This spell closes all mortal wounds and restores any missing body parts.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a -4 penalty to all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. Every time the target finishes a long rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it disappears.

Casting this spell to restore life to a creature that has been dead for one year or longer taxes you greatly. Until you finish a long rest, you can't cast spells again, and you have disadvantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

spell.name: Reverse Gravity

components.m: a lodestone and iron filings

entries: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot high cylinder centered on a point within range. All creatures and objects that aren't somehow anchored to the ground in the area fall upward and reach the top of the area when you cast this spell. A creature can make a Dexterity saving throw to grab onto a fixed object it can reach, thus avoiding the fall.

If some solid object (such as a ceiling) is encountered in this fall, falling objects and creatures strike it just as they would during a normal downward fall. If an object or creature reaches the top of the area without striking anything, it remains there, oscillating slightly, for the duration.
At the end of the duration, affected objects and creatures fall back down.

spell.name: Revivify

m.text: diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You touch a creature that has died within the last dakika. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

spell.name: Rope Trick (Halat Hilesi)

components.m: mısır unu ve bükülmüş bir parşömen halkası

entries: 60 fit uzunluğa kadar bir halata dokunursun. Halatın bir ucu havaya kalkar ve tümü yere dik bir şekilde durur. Halatın üst ucunda büyü sona erene kadar kalacak olan, boyutdışı bir alana açılan görünmez bir geçit açılır.
Bu boyutdışı alana halatın ucuna tırmanarak erişilebilir. Bu alan 8'e kadar Orta ya da daha küçük varlığı alabilir. Halat bu alana çekilip dışarıdan görünmesi engellenebilir.
Saldırılar ve büyüler bu boyutdışı alanın içine ya da dışına geçemez, ama içeridekiler dışarısını halat merkezli 3'e 5 fit boyutlarında bir pencereden bakarcasına izleyebilir.
Bu boyutdışı alandaki her şey büyü bittiğinde dışarı atılır.

spell.name: Sacred Flame (Kutsal Alev)
entries: Menzilinde görebildiğin bir varlığın üzerine alev benzeri bir parlaklık iner. Hedef Çeviklik kurtulma zarında başarılı olur ya da {@dice 1d8} radyant hasar alır. Hedef bu kurtulma zarına siperden dolayı herhangi bir bonus almaz.
Bu büyünün hasarı belirli seviyelerde {@dice 1d8} artarak 5. seviyede ({@dice 2d8}), 11. seviyede ({@dice 3d8}) ve 17. seviyede ({@dice 4d8}) olur.

spell.name: Sanctuary (Mabet)

components.m: küçük bir gümüş ayna

entries: Menzilindeki bir varlığı saldırılara karşı koruma altına alırsın. Büyü bitene kadar, koruma altındaki varlığı saldırı ya da zararlı büyülerle hedef alan tüm varlıklar önce Akıl kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olursa, varlık yeni bir hedef seçer ya da saldırı ya da büyüyü kaybeder. Bu büyü korunan varlığı, alevtopunun patlaması gibi alan etkilerinden koruyamaz.
Eğer korunan varlık düşman bir varlığı etkileyen büyü kullanırsa ya da saldırırsa bu büyü sona erer.

spell.name: Scorching Ray (Kavurucu Işın)
entries: Menzilindeki bir hedefe doğru yarattığın üç ateş ışınını atarsın. Hepsini aynı hedefe ya da farklı hedeflere atabilirsin.
Her ışın için ayrı bir menzilli büyü saldırısı yap. Vurursa, hedef {@dice 2d6} ateş hasarı alır.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 3. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 2. üzeri her seviye için fazladan bir ışın yaratırsın.

spell.name: Scrying

m.text: a focus worth at least 1,000 gp, such as a crystal ball, a silver mirror, or a font filled with holy water

entries: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw, which is modified by how well you know the target and the sort of physical connection you have to it. If a target knows you're casting this spell, it can fail the saving throw voluntarily if it wants to be observed.

entries.caption: Bilgi of Target
rows: Secondhand (you have heard of the target)

entries.caption: Connection to Target
rows: Body part, lock of hair, bit of nail, or the like

entries: On a successful save, the target isn't affected, and you can't use this spell against it again for 24 saat.

On a failed save, the spell creates an invisible sensor within 10 feet of the target. You can see and hear through the sensor as if you were there. The sensor moves with the target, remaining within 10 feet of it for the duration. A creature that can see {@condition invisible} objects sees the sensor as a luminous orb about the size of your fist.
Instead of targeting a creature, you can choose a location you have seen before as the target of this spell. When you do, the sensor appears at that location and doesn't move.

spell.name: Searing Smite (Dağlayan Çarpma)
entries: Büyünün süresi içerisinde bir varlığa yakın dövüş silahı saldırısı ile ilk vuruşunda, silahın kızgın beyaz alevlerle parlar, bu saldırı fazladan {@dice 1d6} ateş hasarı verir ve hedefin alev almasını sağlar. Büyü bitene kadar her sırasının başında, hedef Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olursa {@dice 1d6} ateş hasarı alır. Başarılı olursa, büyü sonlanır. Eğer hedefin kendisi ya da 5 fit yakınındaki bir varlık eylemini kullanıp alevleri söndürürse, ya da başka bir etki ateşleri söndürürse (hedefin suya girmesi gibi), büyü sonlanır.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 2. seviye ya da üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 1. sonrasında her seviye için saldırıda ilk verilen hasar {@dice 1d6} artar.

spell.name: See Invisibility (Görünmezliği Gör)

components.m: Bir tutam talk pudrası ve bir serpmelik gümüş tozu

entries: Süre boyunca {@condition görünmezlik} etkisi altındaki varlıkları ve nesneleri görebilir ve ayrıca Ethereal boyutu da görebilirsin. Ethereal varlıklar ve nesneler şeffaf ve hayaletimsi görününür.

spell.name: Seeming
entries: This spell allows you to change the appearance of any number of creatures that you can see within range. You give each target you choose a new, illusory appearance. An unwilling target can make a Charisma saving throw, and if it succeeds, it is unaffected by this spell.

The spell disguises physical appearances as well as clothing, armor, weapons, and equipment. You can make each creature seem 1 foot shorter or taller and appear thin, fat, or in-between. You can't change a target's body type, so you must choose a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you. The spell lasts for the duration, unless you use your eylem to dismiss it sooner.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspections. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to a creature's outfit objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing or would feel the creature's head and hair. If you use this spell to appear thinner then you are, the hand of someone who reaches out to touch you would bump into you while it was seemingly still in midair.
A creature can use its eylem to inspect a target and make an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it becomes aware that the target is disguised.

spell.name: Sending

components.m: A short piece of fine copper wire

entries: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar. The creature hears the message in its mind, recognizes you as the sender if it knows you, and can answer in a like manner immediately. The spell enables creatures with Intelligence scores of at least 1 to understand the meaning of your message.
You can send the message across any distance and even to other planes of existence, but if the target is on a different plane than you, there is a 5 percent chance that the message doesn't arrive.

spell.name: Sequester

m.text: a powder composed of diamond, emerald, ruby, and sapphire dust worth at least 5,000 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: By means of this spell, a willing creature or an object can be hidden away, safe from detection for the duration. When you cast the spell and touch the target, it becomes {@condition invisible} and can't be targeted by {@filter divination spells|spells|school=D} or perceived through scrying sensors created by the divination of spells.
If the target is a creature, it falls into a state of suspended animation. Time ceases to flow for it, and it doesn't grow older.

You can set a condition for the spell to end early. The condition can be anything you choose, but it must occur or be visible within 1 mile of the target. Examples include after 1,000 years or when the tarrasque awakes. This spells also ends if the target takes any damage.

spell.name: Shapechange

m.text: a jade circlet worth at least 1,500 gp, which you must place on your head before you cast the spell

entries: You assume the form of a different creature for the duration. The new form can be any creature with a challenge rating equal to your level or lower. The creature can't be a construct or an undead, and you must have seen the sort of creature at least once. You transform into an average example of that creature, one without any class levels or the Spellcasting trait.

Your game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the chosen creature, though you retain your alignment and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores You also retain all of your skill and saving throw proficiencies, in addition to gaining those of the creature, If the creature has the same proficiency as you, and the bonus listed in its statistics is higher than yours, use the creature's bonus in place of yours. You can't use any legendary actions or lair actions of the new form.

You assume the hit points and Hit Dice of the new form. When you revert to your normal, you return to the number of hit points you had before you transformed. If you revert as a result of dropping to 0 hit points, any excess damage carries over to your normal form. As long as the excess damage doesn't reduce your normal form to 0 hit points, you aren't knocked {@condition unconscious}.

You retain the benefit of any features from your class, race, or other source and can use them, provided that your new form is physically capable of doing so. You can't use any special senses you have (for example, darkvision) unless your new form also has that sense. You can only speak if the creature can normally speak.

When you transform, you choose whether your equipment falls to the ground, merges into the new form, or is worn by it. Worn equipment functions as normal. The DM determines whether it is practical for the new form to wear a piece of equipment, based on the creature's shape and size. Your equipment doesn't change shape or size to match the new form, and any equipment that the new form can't wear must either fall to the ground or merge into your new form. Equipment that merges has no effect in that state.

During this spell's duration, you can use your eylem to assume a different form following the same restrictions and rules for the original form, with one exception: if your new form has more hit points than your current one, your hit points remain at their current value.

spell.name: Shatter (Paramparça Et)

components.m: bir evrenpulu parçası

entries: Menzilinde seçeceğin bir noktadan, acı veren şiddetiyle ani bir çınlama sesi çıkar. Seçtiğin nokta merkezli ve 10 fit yarıçaplı bir kürenin içinde kalan her varlık Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olan bir varlık {@dice 3d8} ses hasarı alır, başarılı olursa yarısını. Taş, kristal ya da metal gibi cansız materyalden yapılma bir varlık bu kurtulma zarında dezavantajlı olur.
Büyünün etki alanında bulunan ve taşınmayan ya da giyilmeyen büyüsüz nesneler de bu hasarı alır.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 3. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 2. üzeri her seviye için hasar {@dice 1d8} artar.

spell.name: Shield (Kalkan)

time.condition: bir darbe aldığında ya da {@spell Büyülü Misil} büyüsü ile hedef alındığında kullanırsın

entries: Büyü gücünden oluşan görünmez bir bariyer belirip seni korur. Bir sonraki sıranın başına kadar, tetikleyen saldırıya karşı da olmak üzere AC'ye +5 bonusun olur, ve büyülü misilden hiç hasar almazsın.

spell.name: Shield of Faith (İnanç Kalkanı)

components.m: üzerinde biraz kutsal metin yazılı olan bir parça parşömen

entries: Menzilinde seçeceğin bir varlığı parıldayan bir enerji alanı kaplar, ve süre boyunca AC'sine +2 bonus verir.

spell.name: Shillelagh

components.m: ökseotu, bir yonca yaprağı, ve bir sopa ya da asa

entries: Tuttuğun sopa ya da asanın odunu doğanın gücü ile dolar. Süre boyunca, bu silah ile yapacağın yakın dövüş saldırılarında ve bunların hasar zarlarında Kuvvet bonusun yerine, büyü yapma yetenek bonusunu kullanabilirsin, ve silahın hasar zarı {@dice d8} olur. Silah zaten büyülü değilse büyülü sayılır. Eğer büyüyü yeniden kullanırsan ya da silahı bırakırsan büyü sona erer.

spell.name: Shocking Grasp (Şok Edici Kavrama)
entries: Dokunmaya çalıştığın varlığı çarpmak için elinden şimşekler çıkar. Hedefe karşı yakın dövüş büyü saldırısı yap. Eğer hedef metalden yapılmış bir zırh giyiyorsa bu saldırı zarında avantajın olur. Vurursa, hedef {@dice 1d8} yıldırım hasarı alır, ve bir sonraki sırasının başına kadar reaksiyon kullanamaz.
Bu büyünün hasarı belirli seviyelerde {@dice 1d8} artarak 5. seviyede ({@dice 2d8}), 11. seviyede ({@dice 3d8}) ve 17. seviyede ({@dice 4d8}) olur.

spell.name: Silence (Sessizlik)
entries: Menzilinde seçeceğin bir noktadan çıkan, süre boyunca içinde ses yaratılamayan ve sesin giremeyeceği 20 fit yarıçaplı bir küre yaratırsın. Tamamıyla bu alanda olan her varlık ve nesne ses hasarı almaz, ve bu varlıklar {@condition sağırlık} etkisi altındadır. Bu alanda sesli bileşen gerektiren büyüleri yapmak imkansızdır.

spell.name: Silent Image (Sessiz Görüntü)

components.m: biraz yün

entries: 15 fitlik bir küpten daha küçük olan bir nesne, varlık ya da görülebilen bir fenomen görüntüsü yaratırsın. Görüntü menzilinde bir noktada belirir ve süre boyunca kalır. Görüntü tamamıyla görseldir, ses, koku ya da diğer duyusal etkileri yoktur.

Eylemini kullanarak görüntüyü menzilindeki başka bir noktaya taşıyabilirsin. Görüntü yer değiştirirken, bu hareketin doğal görünmesini sağlamak için görünüşünü değiştirebilirsin. Örneğin, bir varlık görüntüsü yaratıp onu hareket ettirirsen, görüntüyü onu yürüyormuş gibi gösterir şekilde değiştirebilirsin.

Görüntü ile fiziksel etkileşim onun illüzyon olduğunu ortaya çıkarır, çünkü nesneler içinden geçebilir. Bir varlık onun illüzyon olduğunu anlamak için eylemini kullanıp, senin büyü kurtulma DC'ne karşı bir Zeka (İnceleme) zarı atabilir. Eğer illüzyonu farkederse, görüntü saydamlaşır.

spell.name: Simulacrum

m.text: snow or ice in quantities sufficient to made a life-size copy of the duplicated creature some hair, fingernail clippings, or other piece of that creature's body placed inside the snow or ice and powdered ruby worth 1,500 gp, sprinkled over the duplicate and consumed by the spell

entries: You shape an illusory duplicate of one beast or humanoid that is within range for the entire casting time of the spell. The duplicate is a creature, partially real and formed from ice or snow, and it can take actions and otherwise be affected as a normal creature. It appears to be the same as the original, but it has half the creature's hit point maximum and is formed without any equipment. Otherwise, the illusion uses all the statistics of the creature it duplicates.

The simulacrum is friendly to you and creatures you designate. It obeys your spoken commands, moving and acting in accordance with your wishes and acting on your turn in combat. The simulacrum lacks the ability to learn or become more powerful, so it never increases its level or other abilities, nor can it regain expended spell slots.

If the simulacrum is damaged, you can repair it in an alchemical laboratory, using rare herbs and minerals worth 100 gp per hit point it regains. The simulacrum lasts until it drops to 0 hit points, at which point it reverts to snow and melts instantly.
If you cast this spell again, any currently active duplicates you created with this spell are instantly destroyed.

spell.name: Sleep (Uyku)

components.m: bir tutam ince kum, gül yaprakları ya da bir cırcır böceği

entries: Bu büyü varlıkları büyülü bir uykuya daldırır.{@dice 5d8} zar at, toplamı bu büyünün kaç HP'lik varlığı etkileyebileceğini gösterir. Menzilinde seçtiğin bir noktanın 20 fit çevresindeki varlıklar, o anlık HP'lerine göre artan sıralamayla etkilenirler (bilinçsiz varlıklar yoksayılır).

O anlık en az HP'ye sahip varlıkla başlayıp, bu büyüden etkilenen tüm varlıklar büyü sonuna, uyuyan hasar alana, ya da biri eylemini kullanıp onu uyandırana kadar bilinçsiz kalırlar. Her etkilenen varlığın HP'sini kalan toplamdan çıkarıp sonraki en düşük HP'li varlığa geç. Bir varlığın etkilenebilmesi için HP'si kalan toplama eşit ya da daha düşük olmalıdır.
Yaşayan ölüler ve cezbedilmeye bağışıklığı olan varlıklar bu büyüden etkilenmez.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 2. seviye ya da üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 1. sonrasında her seviye için fazladan {@dice 2d8} atarsın.

spell.name: Sleet Storm

components.m: a pinch of dust and a few drops of water

entries: Until the spell ends, freezing rain and sleet fall in a 20-foot-tall cylinder with a 40-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range. The area is heavily obscured, and exposed flames in the area are doused.

The ground in the area is covered with slick ice, making it difficult terrain. When a creature enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, it falls {@condition prone}.
If a creature is concentrating in the spell's area, the creature must make a successful Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or lose concentration.

spell.name: Slow

components.m: a drop of molasses

entries: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's speed is halved, it takes a -2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't use reactions. On its turn, it can use either an eylem or a bonus eylem, not both. Regardless of the creature's abilities or magic items, it can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.

If the creature attempts to cast a spell with a casting time of 1 eylem, roll a {@dice d20}. On an 11 or higher, the spell doesn't take effect until the creature's next turn, and the creature must use its eylem on that turn to complete the spell. If it can't, the spell is wasted.
A creature affected by this spell makes another Wisdom saving throw at the end of its turn. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

spell.name: Spare the Dying (Öleni Esirge)
entries: Hayatta ama 0 HP'si olan bir varlığa dokunursun. Varlık stabil hale gelir. Bu büyünün yaşayan ölüler ya da yapılar üzerinde herhangi bir etkisi yoktur.

spell.name: Speak with Animals (Hayvanlarla Konuş)
entries: Süre boyunca hayvanları anlama ve onlarla sözlü bir şekilde iletişime geçme yeteneğini kazanırsın. Çoğu hayvanın bilgisi ve farkındalığı zekaları ile sınırlanır, ama en azından, hayvanlar sana çevredeki yerler ve yaratıklar hakkında bilgi verebilir, son gün içinde algıladıkları bilgiler de buna dahil. Belki bir hayvanı sana küçük bir iyilik yapmak için ikna edebilirsin, DM'in takdirine kalmıştır.

spell.name: Speak with Dead

components.m: burning incense

entries: You grant the semblance of life and zeka to a corpse of your choice within range, allowing it to answer the questions you pose. The corpse must still have a mouth and can't be undead. The spell fails if the corpse was the target of this spell within the last 10 gün.

Until the spell ends, you can ask the corpse up to five questions. The corpse knows only what it knew in life, including the languages it knew. Answers are usually brief, cryptic, or repetitive, and the corpse is under no compulsion to offer a truthful answer if you are hostile to it or it recognizes you as an enemy. This spell doesn't return the creature's soul to its body, only its animating spirit. Thus, the corpse can't learn new information, doesn't comprehend anything that has happened since it died, and can't speculate about future events.

spell.name: Speak with Plants
entries: You imbue plants within 30 feet of you with limited sentience and animation, giving them the ability to communicate with you and follow your simple commands. You can question plants about events in the spell's area within the past day, gaining information about creatures that have passed, weather, and other circumstances.

You can also turn difficult terrain caused by plant growth (such as thickets and undergrowth) into ordinary terrain that lasts for the duration. Or you can turn ordinary terrain where plants are present into difficult terrain that lasts for the duration, causing vines and branches to hinder pursuers, for example.

Plants might be able to perform other tasks on your behalf, at the DM's discretion. The spell doesn't enable plants to uproot themselves and move about, but they can freely move branches, tendrils, and stalks.
If a plant creature is in the area, you can communicate with it as if you shared a common language, but you gain no magical ability to influence it.
This spell can cause the plants created by the entangle spell to release a {@condition restrained} creature.

spell.name: Spider Climb (Örümcek Tırmanışı)

components.m: bir damla katran ve bir örümcek

entries: Büyü bitene dek dokunduğun istekli bir varlık, dikey yüzeylerde ya da tavanda ters bir şekilde ellerini kullanmadan yürüyebilir. Hedef ayrıca yürüyüş hızına eşit tırmanma hızı kazanır.

spell.name: Spike Growth (Diken Büyümesi)

components.m: yedi küçük diken ya da uçları sivreltilmiş yedi küçük dal

entries: Menzilinde seçeceğin zemin bir noktadan çıkan 20 fit yarıçaplı bir dairede dikenler çıkar. Bu alan süre boyunca zorlu araziye dönüşür. Bir varlık bu alana girerse ya da alan içinde hareket ederse her 5 fit mesafe için {@dice 2d4} delme hasarı alır.
Zemindeki değişim doğal görünmesi için kamufle edilmiştir. Büyü yapıldığı anda alanı göremeyen bir varlık buradaki dikenleri farketmek için senin büyü DC'ne karşı bir Akıl (Algı) zarı atar.

spell.name: Spirit Guardians

components.m: a holy symbol

entries: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.

When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creature's speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@dice 3d8} radyant damage (if you are good or neutral) or {@dice 3d8} nekrotik damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 4. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Spiritual Weapon (Ruhsal Silah)
entries: Süresi boyunca ya da sen bu büyüyü yeniden kullanana kadar kalan, havada süzülen spektral bir silahı menzilinde yaratırsın. Bu büyüyü kullandığında, silahın 5 fit yakınındaki bir varlığa yakın dövüş büyü saldırısı yapabilirsin. Vurursa, hedef {@dice 1d8} + senin büyü yapma yetenek bonusun kadar güç hasarı alır.
Sıranda bonus eylem olarak bu silahı 20 fite kadar hareket ettirip, 5 fit yakınındaki bir varlığa saldırı yapabilirsin.
Bu silah istediğin şekli alabilir. Belirli silahlarla bağdaşmış tanrıların (Aziz Cuthbert gürzü, Thor çekici ile bilinir) rahipleri bu büyünün görüntüsünü o silaha benzetir.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 3. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 2. üzeri her iki seviye için hasar {@dice 1d8} artar.

spell.name: Staggering Smite
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon pierces both body and mind, and the attack deals an extra {@dice 4d6} psişik damage to the target. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions, until the end of its next turn.

spell.name: Stinking Cloud

components.m: a rotten egg or several skunk cabbage leaves

entries: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas centered on a point within range. The cloud spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. The cloud lingers in the air for the duration.

Each creature that is completely within the cloud at the start of its turn must make a Constitution saving throw against zehir. On a failed save, the creature spends its eylem that turn retching and reeling. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to zehir automatically succeed on this saving throw.
A moderate wind (at least 10 miles per saat) disperses the cloud after 4 rounds. A strong wind (at least 20 miles per saat) disperses it after 1 round.

spell.name: Stone Shape

components.m: soft clay, which must be worked into roughly the desired shape of the stone object

entries: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose. So, for example, you could shape a large rock into a weapon, idol, or coffer, or make a small passage through a wall, as long as the wall is less than 5 feet thick. You could also shape a stone door or its frame to seal the door shut. The object you create can have up to two hinges and a latch, but finer mechanical detail isn't possible.

spell.name: Stoneskin

m.text: diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical ezme, delme, and kesme damage.

spell.name: Storm of İntikam
entries: A churning storm cloud forms, centered on a point you can see and spreading to a radius of 360 feet. Lightning flashes in the area, ses booms, and strong winds roar. Each creature under the cloud (no more than 5,000 feet beneath the cloud) when it appears must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 2d6} ses damage and becomes {@condition deafened} for 5 dakika.
Each round you maintain concentration on this spell, the storm produces additional effects on your turn.

entries.name: Round 2
entries: Acidic rain falls from the cloud. Each creature and object under the cloud takes {@dice 1d6} asit damage.

entries.name: Round 3
entries: You call six bolts of yıldırım from the cloud to strike six creatures or objects of your choice beneath the cloud. A given creature or object can't be struck by more than one bolt. A struck creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@dice 10d6} yıldırım damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Round 4
entries: Hailstones rain down from the cloud. Each creature under the cloud takes {@dice 2d6} ezme damage.

entries.name: Round 5-10
entries: Gusts and freezing rain assail the area under the cloud. the area becomes difficult terrain and is heavily obscured. Each creature there takes {@dice 1d6} soğuk damage. Ranged weapon attacks in the area are impossible. The wind and rain count as a severe distraction for the purposes of maintaining concentration on spells. Finally, gusts of strong wind (ranging from 20 to 50 miles per saat) automatically disperse fog, mists, and similar phenomena in the area whether mundane or magical.

spell.name: Suggestion (Tavsiye)

components.m: bir yılan dili ve ya biraz bal peteği ya da bir damla tatlı yağ

entries: Menzilinde görebildiğin ve seni duyup anlayabilen bir varlığa, 1 ya da 2 cümle ile sınırlı bir faaliyet planı tavsiye edip büyülü olarak etkilemeye çalışırsın. {@condition Cezbedilme} etkisine bağışıklığı olan varlıklar bu büyüden etkilenmez. Tavsiye, bu eylem planı akla yatkın olacak bir şekilde dile getirilmelidir. Varlığa kendini bıçaklaması, kendini bir mızrağın üzerine atması, kendini yakması, ya da bariz bir şekilde hasar göreceği bir davranış tavsiye edilirse büyü sona erer.

Hedef Akıl kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olursa, bu tasvir ettiğin faaliyeti elinden geldiğince yapmaya çalışır. Tavsiye edilen faaliyet planı büyünün süresince devam edebilir. Eğer bu eylem daha kısa bir sürede tamamlanabiliyorsa büyü, hedef istenileni yaptığında sonlanır.

Bu süre boyunca belirli durumlarda tetiklenecek özel eylemler de belirleyebilirsin. Örneğin, bir şövalyeye atını ilk gördüğü dilenciye vermesini söyleyebilirsin. Eğer büyü bitene dek bu durum tetiklenmezse, eylem yapılmaz.
Eğer sen ya da dostlarından biri hedefe hasar verirse büyü sonlanır.

spell.name: Sunbeam

components.m: a magnifying glass

entries: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-line. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 6d8} radyant damage and is {@condition blinded} until your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded} by this spell. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on this saving throw.
You can create a new line of radiance as your eylem on any turn until the spell ends.
For the duration, a mote of brilliant radiance shines in your hand. It sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. The light is sunlight.

spell.name: Sunburst

components.m: ateş and a piece of sunstone

entries: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range. Each creature in that light must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 12d6} radyant damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 dakika. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded} by this spell. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on this saving throw.
A creature {@condition blinded} by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, it is no longer {@condition blinded}.
This spell dispels any darkness in its area that was created by a spell.

spell.name: Swift Quiver

components.m: a quiver containing at least one piece of ammunition

entries: You transmute your quiver so it produces an endless supply of nonmagical ammunition, which seems to leap into your hand when you reach for it.

On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use a bonus eylem to make two attacks with a weapon that uses ammunition from the quiver. Each time you make such a ranged attack, your quiver magically replaces the piece of ammunition you used with a similar piece of nonmagical ammunition. Any pieces of ammunition created by this spell disintegrate when the spell ends. If the quiver leaves your possession, the spell ends.

spell.name: Symbol

m.text: mercury, phosphorus, and powdered diamond and opal with a total value of at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a harmful glyph either on a surface (such as a section of floor, a wall, or a table) or within an object that can be closed to conceal the glyph (such as a book, a scroll, or a treasure chest). If you choose a surface, the glyph can cover an area of the surface no larger than 10 feet in diameter. If you choose an object, that object must remain in its place, if the object is moved more than 10 feet from where you cast this spell, the glyph is broken, and the spell ends without being triggered.
The glyph is nearly invisible, requiring an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC to find it.

You decide what triggers the glyph when you cast the spell. For glyphs inscribed on a surface, the most typical triggers include touching or stepping on the glyph, removing another object covering it, approaching within a certain distance of it, or manipulating the object that holds it. For glyphs inscribed within an object, the most common triggers are opening the object, approaching within a certain distance of it, or seeing or reading the glyph.

You can further refine the trigger so the spell is activated only under certain circumstances or according to a creature's physical characteristics (such as height or weight), or physical kind (for example, the ward could be set to affect hags or shapechangers). You can also specify creatures that don't trigger the glyph, such as those who say a certain password.

When you inscribe the glyph, choose one of the options below for its effect. Once triggered, the glyph glows, filling a 60-foot-radius sphere with dim light for 10 dakika, after which time the spell ends. Each creature in the sphere when the glyph activates is targeted by its effect, as is a creature that enters the sphere for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

entries.name: Death
entries: Each target must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@dice 10d10} nekrotik damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.

entries.name: Discord
entries: Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target bickers and argues with other creatures for 1 dakika. During this time, it is incapable of meaningful communication and has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

entries.name: Fear
entries: Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw and becomes {@condition frightened} for 1 dakika on a failed save. While {@condition frightened}, the target drops whatever it is holding and must move at least 30 feet away from the glyph on each of its turns, if able.

entries.name: Hopelessness
entries: Each target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target is overwhelmed with despair for 1 dakika. During this time, it can't attack or target any creature with harmful abilities, spells, or other magical effects.

entries.name: Insanity
entries: Each target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target is driven insane for 1 dakika. An insane creature can't take actions, can't understand what other creatures say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish. The DM controls its movement, which is erratic.

entries.name: Pain
entries: Each target must make a Constitution saving throw and becomes {@condition incapacitated} with excruciating pain for 1 dakika on a failed save.

entries.name: Sleep
entries: Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw and falls {@condition unconscious} for 10 dakika on a failed save. A creature awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an eylem to shake or slap it awake.

entries.name: Stunning
entries: Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw and becomes {@condition stunned} for 1 dakika on a failed save.

spell.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter (Tasha'nın Korkunç Kahkahası)

components.m: küçük turtalar ve havada süzülmüş bir yaprak

entries: Senin seçeceğin menzilinde görebildiğin bir varlık, eğer bu büyü onu etkilerse herşeyi çok komik algılar ve kahkaha krizine girer. Hedef bir Akıl kurtulma zarında başarılı olur ya da yere düşer, etkisiz hale gelir ve süre boyunca ayağa kalkamaz. Zeka skoru 4 ve altında olan bir varlık bu büyüden etkilenmez.
Her sırasının sonunda, ve her hasar alışında, hedef yeni bir Akıl kurtulma zarı atar. Eğer bu kurtulma zarını hasar tetiklediyse, hedef bunu avantajla atar. Başarılı olursa, büyü sonlanır.

spell.name: Telekinesis
entries: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell, and as your eylem each round for the duration, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round, or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

entries.name: Creature
entries: You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. Make an ability check with your spellcasting ability contested by the creature's Strength check. If you win the contest, you move the creature up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward but not beyond the range of this spell. Until the end of your next turn, the creature is {@condition restrained} in your telekinetic grip. A creature lifted upward is suspended in mid-air.
On subsequent rounds, you can use your eylem to attempt to maintain your telekinetic grip on the creature by repeating the contest.

entries.name: Object
entries: You can try to move an object that weighs up to 1,000 pounds. If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction, but not beyond the range of this spell.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, you must make an ability check with your spellcasting ability contested by that creature's Strength check. If you succeed, you pull the object away from that creature and can move it up to 30 feet in any direction but not beyond the range of this spell.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

spell.name: Telepathy

components.m: a pair of linked silver rings

entries: You create a telepathic link between yourself and a willing creature with which you are familiar. The creature can be anywhere on the same plane of existence as you. The spell ends if you or the target are no longer on the same plane.

Until the spell ends, you and the target can instantaneously share words, images, sounds, and other sensory messages with one another through the link, and the target recognizes you as the creature it is communicating with. The spell enables a creature with an Intelligence score of at least 1 to understand the meaning of your words and take in the scope of any sensory messages you send to it.

spell.name: Teleport
entries: This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures of your choice that you can see within range, or a single object that you can see within range, to a destination you select. If you target an object, it must be able to fit entirely inside a 10-foot cube, and it can't be held or carried by an unwilling creature. The destination you choose must be known to you, and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. Your familiarity with the destination determines whether you arrive there successfully. The DM rolls {@dice d100} and consults the table.

entries.name: Familiarity
entries: "Permanent Circle" means a permanent teleportation circle whose sigil sequence you know. "Associated Object" means that you possess an object taken from the desired destination within the last six months, such as a book from a wizard's library, bed linen from a royal suite, or a chunk of marble from a Lich's secret tomb.

"Very Familiar" is a place you have been very often, a place you have carefully studied, or a place you can see when you cast the spell. "Seen Casually" is some place you have seen more than once but with which you aren't very familiar. "Viewed Once" is a place you have seen once, possibly using magic. "Description" is a place whose location and appearance you know through someone else's description, perhaps from a map.

"False Description" is a place that doesn't exist. Perhaps you tried to scry an enemy's sanctum but instead viewed an illusion, or you are attempting to teleport to a familiar location that no longer exists.

entries.name: On Target
entries: You and your group (or the target object) appear where you want to go.

entries.name: Off Target
entries: You and your group (or the target object) appear a random distance away from the destination in a random direction. Distance off target is {@dice 1d10} x {@dice 1d10} percent of the distance that was to be travelled. For example, if you tried to travel 120 miles, landed off target, and rolled a 5 and 3 on the two {@dice d10}s, then you would be off target by 15 percent, or 18 miles. The DM determines the direction off target randomly by rolling a {@dice d8} and designating 1 as north, 2 as north-east, 3 as east, and so on around the points of the compass. If you were teleporting to a coastal city and wound up 18 miles out at sea, you could be in trouble.

entries.name: Similar Area
entries: You and your group (or the target object) wind up in a different area that's visually or thematically similar to the target area. If you are heading for your home laboratory, for example, you might wind up in another wizard's laboratory or in an alchemical supply shop that has many of the same tools and implements as your laboratory. Generally, you appear in the closest similar place, but since the spell has no range limit, you could conceivably wind up anywhere on the plane.

entries.name: Mishap
entries: The spell's unpredictable magic results in a difficult journey. Each teleporting creature (or the target object) takes {@dice 3d10} güç damage and the DM rerolls on the table to see where you wind up (multiple mishaps can occur, dealing damage each time).

spell.name: Teleportation Circle

m.text: rare chalks and inks infused with precious gems with 50 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: As you cast the spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know and that is on the same plane of existence as you. A shimmering portal opens within the circle you drew and remains open until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the portal instantly appears within 5 feet of the destination circle or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

Many major temples, guilds, and other important places have permanent teleportation circles inscribed somewhere within their confines. Each such circle includes a unique sigil sequence—a string of magical runes arranged in a particular pattern. When you first gain the ability to cast this spell, you learn the sigil sequences for two destinations on the Material Plane, determined by the DM. You can learn additional sigil sequences during your adventures. You can commit a new sigil sequence to memory after studying it for 1 dakika.
You can create a permanent teleportation circle by casting this spell in the same location every day for one year. You need not use the circle to teleport when you cast the spell in this way.

spell.name: Tenser's Floating Disc (Tenser'ın Süzülen Diski)

components.m: bir damla cıva

entries: Bu büyü, menzilinde seçeceğin görebildiğin bir yerde, zeminden 3 fit yukarda süzülen, 3 fit çapında ve 1 inç kalınlığında, dairesel ve yatay bir güç düzlemi oluşturur. Disk süre boyunca kalır ve 500 pounda kadar taşıyabilir. Eğer üzerine fazladan yük yerleştirilirse büyü sonlanır, ve üzerindeki her şey yere düşer.

Sen 20 fit yakınında olduğun sürece disk hareketsizdir. Eğer sen 20 fitten fazla uzaklaşırsan diskte seni takip eder ve 20 fit yakınında durur. Büyü engebeli arazilerde, eğimlerde ya da merdivenlerde hareket edebilir, ama 10 fit ve üzeri yükselti değişimini aşamazsın. Örneğin, disk 10 fitlik bir çukuru aşamaz ya da öyle bir çukurda yaratıldıysa dışarı çıkamaz.
Eğer diskten 100 fitten fazla uzaklaşırsan (genellikle bir engele takılıp seni takip edemezse olur) büyü sonlanır.

spell.name: Thaumaturgy (Mucize)
entries: Menzilinde doğaüstü güçlerin bir işareti olarak ufak bir mucize yaratırsın. Menzilinde şu büyülü etkilerden birini yaratırsın.

items: 1 dakikalığına sesin normalin 3 katı daha gür olur.
1 dakikalığına alevleri titretir, parlatır, sönükleştirir ya da rengini değiştirirsin.
1 dakikalığına yerde zararsız titreşimler yaratırsın.
Menzilinde seçeceğin bir yer kaynağı olmak üzere, gökgürültüsü, kuzgun sesi, ya da uğursuz fısıltılar gibi anlık bir ses yaratırsın.
Anında kilitsiz bir kapı ya da pencerenin açılması ya da kapanmasını sağlarsın.
1 dakikalığına gözlerinin görünüşünü değiştirirsin.

entries: Eğer bu büyüyü birden çok kez kullanırsan, 1 dakikalık etkilerinden en fazla 3 tanesi aynı anda aktif olabilir, ve bu tip bir etkiyi eylem olarak savabilirsin.

spell.name: Thorn Whip (Diken Kırbacı)

components.m: dikenli bir bitkinin sapı

entries: Senin emrinde menzilindeki bir varlığa doğru atılan, uzunca ve dikenlerle kaplı sarmaşığımsı bir kırbaç yaratırsın. Hedefe karşı yakın dövüş büyü saldırısı yap. Vurursa, varlık {@dice 1d6} delme hasarı alır, ve eğer varlık Büyük ya da daha küçük boyuttaysa onu 10 fite kadar kendine çekersin.
Bu büyünün hasarı belirli seviyelerde {@dice 1d6} artarak 5. seviyede ({@dice 2d6}), 11. seviyede ({@dice 3d6}) ve 17. seviyede ({@dice 4d6}) olur.

spell.name: Thunderous Smite (Gürleyen Çarpma)
entries: Büyünün süresi içinde ilk vurduğun yakın dövüş silahı darbende, silahın 300 fitten duyulabilecek bir gökgürültüsü ile çınlar, ve saldırı hedefe fazladan {@dice 2d6} ses hasarı verir. Ek olarak, eğer hedef bir varlıksa Kuvvet kurtulma zarında başarılı olur ya da senden 10 fite kadar uzağa itilir ve yere düşer.

spell.name: Thunderwave (Gürleyen Dalga)
entries: Senden dışarı doğru gümbürdeyen bir güç dalgalanır. Senden çıkan 15 fitlik bir kübün içindeki tüm varlıklar Dayanıklılık kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olursa, bir varlık {@dice 2d8} ses hasarı alır ve senden 10 fit uzağa itilir. Başarılı olursa, varlık yarı hasarı alır ve itilmez.
Ek olarak, tamamı etki alanındaki sabitlenmemiş tüm nesneler otomatik olarak 10 fit itilir, ve büyü 300 fitten duyulabilecek bir gümbürtü yaratır.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 2. seviye ya da üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 1. sonrasında her seviye için hasar {@dice 1d8} artar.

spell.name: Time Stop
entries: You briefly stop the flow of time for everyone but yourself. No time passes for other creatures, while you take {@dice 1d4+1} turns in a row, during which you can use actions and move as normal.

This spell ends if one of the actions you use during this period, or any effects that you create during this period, affects a creature other than you or an object being worn or carried by someone other than you. In addition, the spell ends if you move to a place more than 1,000 feet from the location where you cast it.

spell.name: Tongues

components.m: a small clay model of a ziggurat

entries: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears. Moreover, when the target speaks, any creature that knows at least one language and can hear the target understands what it says.

spell.name: Transport via Plants
entries: This spell creates a magical link between a Large or larger inanimate plant within range and another plant, at any distance, on the same plane of existence. You must have seen or touched the destination plant at least once before. For the duration, any creature can step into the target plant and exit from the destination plant by using 5 feet of movement.

spell.name: Tree Stride
entries: You gain the ability to enter a tree and move from inside it to inside another tree of the same kind within 500 feet. Both trees must be living and at least the same size as you. You must use 5 feet of movement to enter a tree. You instantly know the location of all other trees of the same kind within 500 feet and, as part of the move used to enter the tree, can either pass into one of those trees or step out of the tree you're in. You appear in a spot of your choice within 5 feet of the destination tree, using another 5 feet of movement. If you have no movement left, you appear within 5 feet of the tree you entered.
You can use this transportation ability once per round for the duration. You must end each turn outside a tree.

spell.name: True Polymorph

components.m: a drop of mercury, a dollop of gum arabic, and a wisp of smoke

entries: Choose one creature with at least 1 hit point or nonmagical object that you can see within range. You transform the creature into a different creature, the creature into an object, or the object into a creature (the object must be neither worn nor carried by another creature). The transformation lasts for the duration, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies. If you concentrate on this spell for the full duration, the transformation becomes permanent.
Shapechangers aren't affected by this spell. An unwilling creature can make a Wisdom saving throw, and if it succeeds, it isn't affected by this spell.

entries.name: Creature into Creature
entries: If you turn a creature into another kind of creature, the new form can be any kind you choose whose challenge rating is equal to or less than the target's (or its level, if the target doesn't have a challenge rating). The target's game statistics, including mental ability scores, are replaced by the statistics of the new form. It retains its alignment and personality.

The target assumes the hit points of its new form, and when it reverts to its normal form, the creature returns to the number of hit points it had before it transformed. If it reverts as a result of dropping to 0 hit points, any excess damage carries over to its normal form. As long as the excess damage doesn't reduce the creature's normal form to 0 hit points, it isn't knocked {@condition unconscious}.

The creature is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its new form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other eylem that requires hands or speech unless its new form is capable of such actions.
The target's gear melds into the new form. The creature can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.

entries.name: Object into Creature
entries: You can turn an object into any kind of creature, as long as the creature's size is no larger than the object's size and the creature's challenge rating is 9 or lower. The creature is friendly to you and your companions. It acts on each of your turns. You decide what eylem it takes and how it moves. The DM has the creature's statistics and resolves all of its actions and movement.
If the spell becomes permanent, you no longer control the creature. It might remain friendly to you, depending on how you have treated it.

entries.name: Creature into Object
entries: If you turn a creature into an object, it transforms along with whatever it is wearing and carrying into that form. The creature's statistics become those of the object, and the creature has no memory of time spent in this form, after the spell ends and it returns to its normal form.
This spell can't affect a target that has 0 hit points.

spell.name: True Resurrection

m.text: a sprinkle of holy water and diamonds worth at least 25,000 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You touch a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years and that died for any reason except old age. If the creature's soul is free and willing, the creature is restored to life with all its hit points.
This spell closes all wounds, neutralizes any zehir, cures all diseases, and lifts any curses affecting the creature when it died. The spell replaces damaged or missing organs or limbs.

The spell can even provide a new body if the original no longer exists, in which case you must speak the creature's name. The creature then appears in an unoccupied space you choose within 10 feet of you.
If the creature was undead, it is restored to its non-undead form.

spell.name: True Seeing

m.text: an ointment for the eyes that costs 25 gp, is made from mushroom powder, saffron, and fat, and is consumed by the spell

entries: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are. For the duration, the creature has truesight, notices secret doors hidden by magic, and can see into the Ethereal Plane, all out to a range of 120 feet.

spell.name: True Strike (Doğru Darbe)
entries: Menzilindeki bir hedefe doğru elini uzatıp parmağınla işaret edersin. Büyün, hedefin savunmasına dair sana kısa bir sezgi verir. Bir sonraki sıranda, o hedefe karşı yapacağın ilk saldırında avantajın olur, tabii ki bu büyü hala bitmediyse.

spell.name: Tsunami
entries: A wall of water springs into existence at a point you choose within range. You can make the wall up to 300 feet long, 300 feet high, and 50 feet thick. The wall lasts for the duration.
When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 6d10} ezme damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

At the start of each of your turns after the wall appears, the wall, along with any creatures in it, moves 50 feet away from you. Any Huge or smaller creature inside the wall or whose space the wall enters when it moves must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take {@dice 5d10} ezme damage. A creature can take this damage only once per round. At the end of the turn, the wall's height is reduced by 50 feet, and the damage creatures take from the spell on subsequent rounds is reduced by {@dice 1d10}. When the wall reaches 0 feet in height, the spell ends.

A creature caught in the wall can move by swimming. Because of the güç of the wave, though, the creature must make a successful Strength (Athletics) check against your spell save DC in order to move at all. If it fails the check, it can't move. A creature that moves out of the area falls to the ground.

spell.name: Unseen Servant (Görünmez Hizmetçi)

components.m: bir parça ip ve biraz odun

entries: Bu büyü süresi boyunca, vereceğin basit görevleri yerine getirecek görünmez, akılsız, ve şekilsiz bir hizmetçi yaratır. Hizmetçin menzilindeki boş bir alanda yaratılır. 10 AC'si, 1 HP'si, 2 Kuvvet skoru vardır ve saldırı yapamaz. Eğer 0 HP'ye düşerse büyü biter.

Her sıranda bonus eylem olarak bir kez, hizmetçine 15 fite kadar hareket edip bir nesne ile etkileşime geçmesini zihinsel olarak emredebilirsin. Hizmetçi bir şeyleri getirme, temizlik, tamir, kıyafet katlama, ateş yakma, yemek servis etme ve şarap doldurma gibi insan bir hizmetçinin yapabileceği görevleri yerine getirebilir. Bir emir verdiğinde, hizmetçi görevi yapabildiği en iyi şekilde yerine getirmeye çalışıp bitirir, sonrasında yeni emrini bekler.
Eğer hizmetçine onun senden 60 fitten fazla uzaklaşmasını sağlayacak bir görev emri verirsen, büyü sona erer.

spell.name: Vampiric Touch
entries: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon güç from others to heal your wounds. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes {@dice 3d6} nekrotik damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of nekrotik damage dealt. Until the spell ends, you can make the attack again on each of your turns as an eylem.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 4. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Vicious Mockery (Acımasız Alay)
entries: Menzilinde görebildiğin bir varlığa, büyüyle bezenmiş bir dizi hakaret edersin. Eğer hedef seni duyabiliyorsa (anlaması gerekmez), Akıl kurtulma zarında başarılı olur ya da {@dice 1d4} psişik hasar alır ve bir sonraki sırasının sonuna kadar yapacağı ilk saldırı zarında dezavantajı olur.
Bu büyünün hasarı belirli seviyelerde {@dice 1d4} artarak 5. seviyede ({@dice 2d4}), 11. seviyede ({@dice 3d4}) ve 17. seviyede ({@dice 4d4}) olur.

spell.name: Wall of Fire

components.m: a small piece of phosphorus

entries: You create a wall of ateş on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.
When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 5d8} ateş damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals {@dice 5d8} ateş damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 5. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Wall of Force

components.m: a pinch of powder made by crushing a clear gemstone

entries: An invisible wall of güç springs into existence at a point you choose within range. The wall appears in any orientation you choose, as a horizontal or vertical barrier or at an angle. It can be free floating or resting on a solid surface. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a sphere with a radius of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-by-10-foot panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. In any form, the wall is 1/4 inch thick. It lasts for the duration. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (your choice which side).

Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled by dispel magic. A disintegrate spell destroys the wall instantly, however. The wall also extends into the Ethereal Plane, blocking ethereal travel through the wall.

spell.name: Wall of Ice

components.m: a small piece of quartz

entries: You create a wall of ice on a solid surface within range. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a sphere with radium of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-square panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. In any form, the wall is 1 foot thick and lasts for the duration.

If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature within its area is pushed to one side of the wall and must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@dice 10d6} soğuk damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

The wall is an object that can be damaged and thus breached. It has AC 12 and 30 hit points per 10-foot section, and it is vulnerable to ateş damage. Reducing a 10-foot section of wall to 0 hit points destroys it and leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. A creature moving through the sheet of frigid air for the first time on a turn must make a Constitution saving throw. The creature takes {@dice 5d6} soğuk damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 7. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, the damage the wall deals when it appears increases by {@dice 2d6}, and the damage from passing through the sheet of frigid air increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Wall of Stone

components.m: a small block of granite

entries: A nonmagical wall of solid stone springs into existence at a point you choose within range. The wall is 6 inches thick and is composed of ten 10-foot-by-10-foot panels. Each panel must be contiguous with at least on other panel. Alternatively, you can create 10-foot-by-20-foot panels that are only 3 inches thick.

If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (your choice). If a creature would be surrounded on all sides by the wall (or the wall and another solid surface), that creature can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, it can use its reaksiyon to move up to its speed so that it is no longer enclosed by the wall.

The wall can have any shape you desire, though it can't occupy the same space as a creature or object. the wall doesn't need to be vertical or resting on any firm foundation. It must, however, merge with and be solidly supported by existing stone. Thus you can use this spell to bridge a chasm or create a ramp.
If you create a span greater than 20 feet in length, you must halve the size of each panel to create supports. You can crudely shape the wall to create crenellations, battlements, and so on.

The wall is an object made of stone that can be damaged and thus breached. Each panel has AC 15 and 30 hit points per inch of thickness. Reducing a panel to 0 hit points destroys it and might cause connected panels to collapse at the DM's discretion.
If you maintain your concentration on this spell for its whole duration, the wall becomes permanent and can't be dispelled. Otherwise, the wall disappears when the spell ends.

spell.name: Wall of Thorns

components.m: a handful of thorns

entries: You create a wall of tough, pliable, tangled brush bristling with needle-sharp thorns. The wall appears within range on a solid surface and lasts for the duration. You choose to make the wall up to 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick or a circle that has a 20-foot diameter and is up to 20 feet high and 5 feet thick. The wall blocks line of sight.
When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 7d8} delme damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

A creature can move through the wall, albeit slowly and painfully. For every 1 foot a creature moves through the wall, it must spend 4 feet of movement. Furthermore, the first time a creature enters the wall on a turn or ends its turn there, the creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@dice 7d8} kesme damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful save.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 7. seviye ve üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, both types of damage increase by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Warding Bond (Koruyucu Bağ)

m.text: tanesi en az 50 gp değerinde bir çift platin yüzük, süresi boyunca hedef ve sen takmalısınız

entries: Bu büyü süresi sonuna kadar, dokunacağın istekli bir varlık ile senin aranda mistik bir bağ yaratıp hedefi korur. Hedef 60 fit yakınındayken, AC ve kurtulma zarlarına +1 bonus alır, ve tüm hasara karşı direnci olur. Ayrıca hedef ne zaman hasar alsa sende aynı hasarı alırsın.

Eğer sen 0 HP'ye düşersen ya da hedefle 60 fitten fazla birbirinizden uzaklaşırsanız büyü sonlanır. Eğer bu büyü zaten etki altında olan varlıklar üzerinde tekrar kullanılırsa da biter. Büyüyü eylem olarak bitirebilirsin.

spell.name: Water Breathing

components.m: a short reed or piece of straw

entries: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends. Affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.

spell.name: Water Walk

components.m: a piece of cork

entries: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, asit, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground (creatures crossing molten lava can still take damage from the heat). Up to ten willing creatures you can see within range gain this ability for the duration.
If your target a creature submerged in a liquid, the spell carries the target to the surface of the liquid at a rate of 60 feet per round.

spell.name: Web (Ağ)

components.m: bir miktar örümcek ağı

entries: Menzilinde seçeceğin bir noktada kalın ve yapışkan bir ağ kütlesi yaratırsın. Süresi boyunca bu ağ 20 fitlik bir kübün alanını kaplar. Ağlar zorlu arazi olur ve alanını hafifçe örtüler.

Eğer ağlar iki sağlam kütle arasında (duvarlar ya da ağaçlar gibi) sabitlenmediyse ya da zemin, tavan ve duvar gibi yüzeylere katmanlanıp yerleştirilmediyse, yaratılan ağ kendi üzerine çöker ve büyü bir sonraki sıranın başında sona erer. Düz bir zemine katmanlanan ağların 5 fit derinliği olur.

Sırasına ağın içinde başlayan ya da sırasında o alana giren varlıklar Çeviklik kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olursa, varlık ağlarda kaldığı sürece ya da özgür kalana kadar {@condition kısıtlanma} etkisi altındadır.
Ağlar tarafından kısıtlanan bir varlık eylemini kullanıp senin büyü DC'ne karşı bir Kuvvet zarı atabilir. Başarılı olursa, artık {@condition kısıtlanma} etkisi altında değildir.
Ağlar yanıcıdır. Ağın ateşe maruz kalan her 5 fitlik kübü 1 roundda yanar ve sırasına ateş içinde başlayan her varlığa {@dice 2d4} ateş hasarı verir.

spell.name: Weird
entries: Drawing on the deepest fears of a group of creatures, you create illusory creatures in their minds, visible only to them. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes {@condition frightened} for the duration. The illusion calls on the creature's deepest fears, manifesting its worst nightmares as an implacable threat. At the end of each of the {@condition frightened} creature's turns, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take {@dice 4d10} psişik damage. On a successful save, the spell ends for that creature.

spell.name: Wind Walk

components.m: ateş and holy water

entries: You and up to ten willing creatures you can see within range assume a gaseous form for the duration, appearing as wisps of cloud. While in this cloud form, a creature has a flying speed of 300 feet and has resistance to damage from nonmagical weapons. The only actions a creature can take in this form are the Dash eylem or to revert to its normal form. Reverting takes 1 dakika, during which time a creature is {@condition incapacitated} and can't move. Until the spell ends, a creature can revert to cloud form, which also requires the 1-dakika transformation.

If a creature is in cloud form and flying when the effect ends, the creature descends 60 feet per round for 1 dakika until it lands, which it does safely. If it can't land after 1 dakika, the creature falls the remaining distance.

spell.name: Wind Wall

components.m: a tiny fan and a feather of exotic origin

entries: A wall of strong wind rises from the ground at a point you choose within range. You can make the wall up to 50 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. You can shape the wall in any way you choose so long as it makes one continuous path along the ground. The wall lasts for the duration.
When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Strength saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 3d8} ezme damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The strong wind keeps fog, smoke, and other gases at bay. Small or smaller flying creatures or objects can't pass through the wall. Loose, lightweight materials brought into the wall fly upward. Arrows, bolts, and other ordinary projectiles launched at targets behind the wall are deflected upward and automatically miss. (Boulders hurled by giants or siege engines, and similar projectiles, are unaffected.) Creatures in gaseous form can't pass through it.

spell.name: Wish
entries: Wish is the mightiest spell a mortal creature can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter the very foundations of reality in accord with your desires.

The basic use of this spell is to duplicate any other spell of 8th level or lower. You don't need to meet any requirements in that spell, including costly components. The spell simply takes effect. Alternatively, you can create one of the following effects of your choice.

items: You create one object of up to 25,000 gp in value that isn't a magic item. The object can be no more than 300 feet in any dimension, and it appears in an unoccupied space you can see on the ground.
You allow up to twenty creatures that you can see to regain all hit points, and you end all effects on them described in the greater restoration spell.
You grant up to ten creatures that you can see resistance to a damage type you choose.

You grant up to ten creatures you can see immunity to a single spell or other magical effect for 8 saat. For instance, you could make yourself and all your companions immune to a lich's life drain attack.

You undo a single recent event by forcing a reroll of any roll made within the last round (including your last turn). Reality reshapes itself to accommodate the new result. For example, a wish spell could undo an opponent's successful save, a foe's critical hit, or a friend's failed save. You can güç the reroll to be made with advantage or disadvantage, and you can choose whether to use the reroll or the original roll.

entries: You might be able to achieve something beyond the scope of the above examples. State your wish to the DM as precisely as possible. The DM has great latitude in ruling what occurs in such an instance, the greater the wish, the greater the likelihood that something goes wrong. This spell might simply fail, the effect you desire might only be partly achieved, or you might suffer some unforeseen consequence as a result of how you worded the wish. For example, wishing that a villain were dead might propel you forward in time to a period when that villain is no longer alive, effectively removing you from the game. Similarly, wishing for a legendary magic item or artifact might instantly transport you to the presence of the item's current owner.

The stress of casting this spell to produce any effect other than duplicating another spell weakens you. After enduring that stress, each time you cast a spell until you finish a long rest, you take {@dice 1d10} nekrotik damage per level of that spell. This damage can't be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength drops to 3, if it isn't 3 or lower already, for {@dice 2d4} gün. For each of those gün that you spend resting and doing nothing more than light activity, your remaining recovery time decreases by 2 gün. Finally, there is a 33 percent chance that you are unable to cast Wish ever again if you suffer this stress.

spell.name: Witch Bolt (Cadı Oku)

components.m: yıldırım düşmüş bir ağaçtan dal

entries: Menzilindeki bir varlığa doğru çatırdayan mavi bir enerji ışını gider ve hedef ile senin aranda devamlı bir yıldırım akımı ortaya çıkarır. O varlığa karşı bir menzilli büyü saldırısı yap. Vurursa, hedef {@dice 1d12} yıldırım hasarı alır, ve süre boyunca her sıranda eylemini kullanıp hedefe otomatik olarak {@dice 1d12} yıldırım hasarı verirsin. Eğer eylemini başka bir şey yapmak için kullanırsan büyü sonlanır. Eğer hedef büyünün menzili dışına çıkar ya da tam siper arkasına geçerse de büyü sonlanır.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Üst Seviyelerde
entries: Bu büyüyü 2. seviye ya da üzeri bir büyü yuvası harcayarak kullandığında, 1. sonrasında her seviye için hasar {@dice 1d12} artar.

spell.name: Word of Recall
entries: You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary. You and any creatures that teleport with you appear in the nearest unoccupied space to the spot you designated when you prepared your sanctuary (see below). If you cast this spell without first preparing a sanctuary, the spell has no effect.

You must designate a sanctuary by casting this spell within a location, such as a temple, dedicated to or strongly linked to your deity. If you attempt to cast the spell in this manner in an area that isn't dedicated to your deity, the spell has no effect.

spell.name: Wrathful Smite (Hiddetli Çarpma)
entries: Büyü süresi içinde, bir varlığa yakın dövüş silahı ile ilk vuruşunda, saldırın fazladan {@dice 1d6} psişik hasar verir. Ek olarak, eğer hedef bir varlıksa Akıl kurtulma zarında başarılı olur ya da büyü sona erene kadar senden korkar. Varlık, eylem olarak senin büyü kurtulma DC'ne karşı Akıl zarı atıp, iradesini toplayarak büyüyü sonlandırabilir.

spell.name: Zone of Truth (Doğruluk Alanı)
entries: Menzilinde seçeceğin bir noktadan çıkan 15 fit yarıçaplı bir küre içinde aldatmaya karşı koruyan büyülü bir alan yaratırsın. Büyü bitene dek, sırasında büyünün alanına giren ya da sırasına bu alanda başlayan her varlık Karizma kurtulma zarı atar. Başarısız olursa, bir varlık bu alan içerisinde bariz bir yalan söyleyemez. Varlıkların bu kurtulma zarında başarılı olup olmadığını bilirsin.
Etkilenen bir varlık büyünün farkında olur ve normalde yalan söyleyeceği soruları cevaplamayabilir. Bu tip varlıklar doğruluk sınırlarında kaldığı sürece kaçamak cevaplar verebilir.
